text:
Hello,

Currently i am using tomcat 7.0.42 with liferay 6.2-ce-ga2, and getting stackoverflow error.

You can have a look at below link for more details

http://www.liferay.com/community/forums/-/message_boards/message/45604006


based on details from
https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=56339#c4

I downloaded tomcat 7.042/54/57 to test it, and its same on all versions.

Please suggest.
creator: m.gawade@maxxton.com

text: You (or the application you are using) has created a wrapper that wraps itself.
creator: markt@apache.org
m.gawade@maxxton.com
text:
(In reply to Mark Thomas from comment #1)
> You (or the application you are using) has created a wrapper that wraps
> itself.


Thanks Mark for the update, but can be add some more description?

creator: chris@christopherschultz.net
text: Bugzilla is not a support forum. Please join the users' mailing list to have a discussion.
